cigars.bandDescription: Gray band with red trim, crossed swords, and gold initials AVD.
Light blue band with shield, crossed swords, and gold AVD.
Colorful band with skull, ADVentura branding, and 'La Llorona' text.
White band with black shield, crossed keys, and 'A', 'V', 'D' letters.
White band with red shield outline, red crossed keys, and AVD.
White band with blue shield outline, blue crossed keys, AVD.
Gold metal shield band with embossed crossed keys and AVD.
White and gold shield band with crossed keys and AVD text.
Silver and black band with AVD and crossed swords emblem.
Red and gold bands with Aganorsa Leaf and Rare Leaf Reserve.
Gold and black band with AGANORSA LEAF and Rare Leaf Reserve.
Red, white, and gold band with New Cuba and small flag.
Bright red band with Cuban flag and bold New Cuba text.
Red band with Cuban flag, 'New Cuba' text, and white lower band with green tobacco leaf emblem.
Gold and black band with '20th Anniversary' and 'AJ Fernandez'. Circular 'A' logo at top center.
Red and cream band reads 'Last Call' and 'By AJ Fernandez' with 'Premium Aged Tobacco' on the top border.
White and gold band reads 'Last Call' and 'By AJ Fernandez' with 'Premium Aged Tobacco' along the top edge.
White and red band reads 'New World' over a colonial painting, with gold medallions and red footer band.
Red and green band reads 'New World Cameroon Selection' over colonial artwork.
White and red band reads 'New World' over a colonial painting, with gold medallions and white footer band.
Tan and gold band reads 'New World' over detailed colonial imagery.
White and brown band with 'New World' above gold colonial artwork.
Red and gold band says 'New World' above an old world scene, with 'Puro Especial' and 'AJ Fernandez' on lower bands.
Black band featuring a sculpted silver face with gold details.

cigars.line: El Pulpo By Artesano Del Tobacco

cigars.bandDescription: Gold and red band with an ornate central emblem featuring a large 'X' symbol and intricate scrollwork. Secondary band below shows '2016' in metallic gold numbers over a patterned background. Decorative layering and rich color accents give the band a luxurious appearance.

Red and gold band with large overlapping 'X' letters in the center. A secondary band near the foot reads '2016' in gold on a red and black background with gold trim. Decorative scrollwork surrounds both bands.

Central band features a portrait of a man labeled 'Don Carlos' with ornate gold detailing and red accents. The name 'A. Fuente' appears above the portrait. A second band near the foot says '2016' in bold gold text on a red and black background.

cigars.line: Fuente Opus X Tauros the Bull
cigars.bandDescription: Gold and black cigar band with a prominent red 'X' design at the center and intricate scrollwork. A secondary band near the foot reads '2016' in large white numbers over a dark, metallic background. Both bands feature layered textures and ornamental detailing.

Large, detailed band with bold black, silver, yellow, and blue X-shaped emblem at the center. Secondary band features metallic red text 'FUENTE' above 'THE OPUS X SOCIETY' in white and silver over a black background. Designed with multiple layers and metallic accents, creating a luxurious and eye-catching appearance.
Gold and red ornate band with large X symbol and 'Lost City' text.
Ornate gold, red, and blue band with large crossed sword. Bottom label reads '20 Years' in gold script on dark blue.
Gold and red double band with a large 'X' emblem and ornate detailing. Bottom band displays '2014' in gold over a red and cream background.
Gold and red band featuring a large ornate 'X' emblem in the center. Decorative scrollwork surrounds the design on a bright background.
Bold black and gold band with a prominent red 'X' logo at the center. Below, a secondary band displays '2018' in large gold numbers.
Gold and red ornate band with a large red 'X' emblem at the center. Below it, a secondary band reads 'Destino al Siglo' with decorative swirls and small printed dates.
Dark cigar with a gold and red 'X' logo on the band, followed by ornate gold detailing. The secondary band reads '2015' in bold red font over a decorative gold ribbon.
Red and gold band with the text 'A. Fuente Gran Reserva' surrounding a gold crest. Decorative elements and a black and gold footer band accent the design.
Intricate band featuring red and green crossed swords, gold detailing, and the letters 'X' and 'F'. A footer band below reads 'Amor del Desierto' with additional gold and white accents.
Large interlocked 'A' crest in silver and white on a blue background. The lower band is coral red and clearly labeled 'Caribe' in white text.
White and silver primary band with an interlocked 'A' crest. Bold red sub-band clearly displays the word 'Nicaragua' in white lettering.
Silver and white 'A' emblem on a deep red-orange gradient band. Text reads 'Nicaragua' and 'Fogata' in gold and white, with flame icons flanking the bottom band.
Silver 'A' logo centered on a teal and turquoise gradient band. Text reads 'South America' and 'Ritmo' in white lettering below the emblem.
Large silver and black interlocked 'A' emblem centered on a red and cream band. Subtle gold pattern detailing behind the logo adds contrast.

cigars.line: Cigars By Drew Estate S84 Shade To Black

cigars.bandDescription: Bold black and red band with 'CAMACHO' in large vertical letters. Features a scorpion icon and 'Infamous Since 1962' in matching red text.
Black band with bright turquoise accents and bold 'CAMACHO' lettering. Includes 'Infamous Since 1962' and a small scorpion graphic.
Unique twisted, almost rope-like, leaf band wrapped around the cigar multiple times. No text or traditional label present.
Gold and black band with 'Casa Magna XV' in bold font. Red accents and 'Aniversario' text appear along the bottom.
Red and cream band with large 'CLE' text in center. Surrounded by white leaves and intricate green detailing above and below.
Red and black band with gold crown logo in the center. Text reads 'Serie E' near the bottom in white letters.
White band with a gold leaf design and slim red background. The word 'Habano' is printed in gold below a dotted line.
Dark wrapper with a band featuring a large gold leaf over a red background. Below it is a black strip with the word 'MADURO' in gold and a dotted white line above it.

Circular red band with gold embossed borders displaying 'FOUR KICKS' in white lettering at top and bottom. The center features an ornate gold emblem or coat of arms design with rich red and metallic gold accents.

Circular blue band with gold embossed borders displaying 'FOUR KICKS' in white lettering at top and bottom. The center features an ornate gold emblem or coat of arms design against a vibrant blue background.
Black and gold band with the words 'FOUR KICKS' and a central gold crest. Ornate gold detailing on each side of the label adds a vintage look.

Circular red band with gold embossed borders displaying 'FOUR KICKS' in white lettering at top and bottom with an ornate gold emblem in the center. Below the main band is a secondary black band with gold borders reading 'Limited Edition (year)'.
Black rectangular band with gold borders featuring 'JERICHO HILL' text curved along the top and bottom edges. The center displays a gold shield or crest emblem with a crown at the top.
Ornate white and gold band with decorative filigree borders displaying 'LE PÂTISSIER' in elegant gold lettering across the center.
Cream-colored oval band with ornate gold filigree patterns and 'LE PÂTISSIER' displayed prominently in gold lettering across the center.
White band with mint green border featuring decorative gold filigree patterns and 'LE PÂTISSIER' displayed across the center in elegant typography.
Gold and blue ornate band with script logo and crest. Lower band reads 'AJ Fernandez' in metallic gold on cream background.

Blue band with gold borders featuring a prominent golden lion emblem in the center. Very regal. The band includes a small '10' marking at the bottom and is complemented by a vertical gold ribbon running along the cigar's length.
White band with gold geometric borders featuring a lion emblem in the center. Very regal. Below the main emblem is a secondary white band with 'SHADE' printed in gold lettering.
Red band with gold borders featuring a gold lion or heraldic emblem in the center. The simplistic design uses a vibrant red background that contrasts with the golden imagery for a classic appearance.

Blue band with gold scalloped edges featuring 'Mi Querida' elegantly scripted in gold lettering across the center. The rich navy blue background creates a striking contrast with the metallic gold text and decorative border.

Green band with gold scalloped edges featuring 'Mi Querida' elegantly scripted in gold lettering across the center. The rich green background creates a striking contrast with the metallic gold text and decorative border.

Black band with white scalloped edges featuring 'Mi Querida' elegantly scripted in white lettering across the center. The rich black background creates a striking contrast with the metallic white text and decorative border.

Red band with gold scalloped edges featuring 'Mi Querida' elegantly scripted in gold lettering across the center. The rich red background creates a striking contrast with the metallic gold text and decorative border.

Gold embossed crown design directly applied to the cigar wrapper without a traditional paper band. The ornate royal crown features detailed points and jewel-like elements rendered in metallic gold against the natural brown cigar wrapper.

Gold embossed crown design with red accents in the center sections of the crown. This ornate royal emblem is applied directly to the cigar wrapper without a traditional paper band, creating an elegant, premium appearance.

Blue circular band with gold rays emanating outward featuring a large golden star in the center. The emblem resembles a medal or military insignia with the vibrant blue background contrasting sharply with the metallic gold star and sunburst pattern.
Black, gold, and silver band with red 'EPC' logo. 'Carrillo' and '15 Aniversario' text in elegant white script.

Red square band with blue and gold borders featuring a stylized 'E&A' monogram in the center. Below the main band is a black secondary band displaying 'CARRILLO' in white letters above a blue band reading 'HONDURAS'.

Black band with gold borders featuring a red square in the center with an elegant 'EP' monogram. Below the main band are two additional black sections displaying 'CARRILLO' in white letters and 'MADURO' in gold letters.

Black band with gold borders featuring a red square in the center with a gold 'EP' monogram. Below the main band are two additional black sections displaying 'CARRILLO' in white letters and 'SUMATRA' in gold letters.

Gold band with architectural brick-like pattern featuring 'INCH' displayed vertically on the left side. The center displays a circular gold emblem or seal with text around its perimeter against a backdrop reminiscent of a building blueprint or floor plan.

Black band with gold borders and red accents featuring a skull and crossbones design with 'CALE SANDY' text across the top. The bottom of the band includes a small red circle with a gold 'E' monogram or logo.

White band with orange diagonal banner displaying 'LARANJA' in bold white letters. The ornate design features a gold crown at the top, decorative gold filigree patterns, and 'RESERVA' in a small white banner at the bottom.

White band with blue diagonal banner displaying 'LARANJA' in bold white letters. The ornate design features a gold crown at the top, decorative gold filigree patterns, and 'AZULEJO' in a small blue banner at the bottom.

White band with black diagonal banner displaying 'LARANJA' in bold white letters. The ornate design features a gold crown at the top, decorative gold filigree patterns, and 'ESCURO' in a small black banner at the bottom.

Minimalist gold band featuring a stylized black bat silhouette emblem against a gold background. The band has a modern, sleek design with no text, allowing the distinctive bat logo to be the prominent visual element.

Minimalist white band featuring a stylized black bat silhouette emblem against a silver background. The band has a modern, sleek design with no text, allowing the distinctive bat logo to be the prominent visual element.

Clear transparent band with gold bat silhouette featuring 'SHIKAKA' printed in black text across the center. Below the main design is a secondary clear band with 'ESPINOSA' printed in white lettering.

Black band with silver borders featuring 'FACTORY SMOKES' in bold white lettering. The band includes smaller text noting 'PREMIUM HANDMADE' at the top and appears industrial-themed with a factory or manufacturing motif. Red trim around all lettering

Black band with silver borders featuring 'FACTORY SMOKES' in bold white lettering. The band includes smaller text noting 'PREMIUM HANDMADE' at the top and appears industrial-themed with a factory or manufacturing motif. Yellow trim around all lettering

Black band with silver borders featuring 'FACTORY SMOKES' in bold white lettering. The band includes smaller text noting 'PREMIUM HANDMADE' at the top and appears industrial-themed with a factory or manufacturing motif. Blue trim around all lettering

cigars.line: Flor De Selva Coleccion Aniversario No. 20

cigars.bandDescription: Dark blue band with gold borders featuring a crown at the top and a green cross emblem with a red 'P' in the center. The band displays 'Menelik' in ornate gold gothic lettering at the bottom, creating a royal, heraldic appearance.

White band with gold borders featuring an ornate monogram or intertwined letters design in the center. The band displays 'Hecho A Mano' in gold lettering at the bottom with decorative flourishes and elegant typography throughout.

White band with gold and red borders featuring 'HIGHCLERE CASTLE' text at the top with a crown design. The center displays an ornate monogram or coat of arms with 'HECHO A MANO' and 'ESTELI NICARAGUA' text at the bottom in gold lettering.

Blue band with gold borders featuring a large gold skull emblem in the center. Below the main band is a secondary black band displaying 'SENETHER' in white lettering, creating a bold, gothic-inspired design.

Red band with gold borders featuring an ornate coat of arms or heraldic crest design in the center. The band displays 'Victorian' in elegant gold script lettering at the bottom, creating a distinguished, premium appearance with intricate decorative elements.

Red and green band with gold accents featuring an ornate eight-pointed star or sunburst design in the center. The geometric pattern combines rich red and emerald green colors with intricate gold detailing in a classic, vintage-inspired medallion style.

Blue rectangular band with gold borders featuring a green cross emblem with the letter 'P' in the center. The band displays 'WISE MAN' in gold lettering at the bottom and includes a small gold crown design at the top.

Red rectangular band with gold borders featuring a green cross emblem with the letter 'P' in the center. The band displays 'WISE MAN' in gold lettering at the bottom and includes a small gold crown design at the top.

cigars.line: Aganorsa Guardian Of The Farm Cerberus
Aganorsa Guardian Of The Farm Nightwatch

cigars.bandDescription: Gold band with embossed crown design at the top featuring 'H.UPMANN' text below the crown. The luxurious metallic gold finish creates an elegant, premium appearance with raised lettering and decorative elements throughout the band.
Dark navy and gold band with 'Ashbar' logo and crest. Lower band reads '10th Anniversary' in gold on black background.

White and red band with four gold diamonds arranged in an X pattern, each containing a letter to spell HOYO' centered over a red background with a star emblem in the middle. Below it is a red and black band with the word 'FERNANDEZ' in bold gold letters.

Black band with red circle and four silver diamonds arranged in an X pattern, each containing a letter to spell 'HOYO' centered over a red background with a star emblem in the middle. Below it is a red and gold band with the word 'FERNANDEZ' in bold silver letters.

four white diamonds arranged in an X pattern, each containing a letter to spell 'HOYO' centered over a red background with a star emblem in the middle. Below it is a red and white band with the word 'FERNANDEZ' in bold silver letters.
Red and gold band with 'HVC' and '10th Anniversary' text. White ribbon-style section highlights anniversary label in bold lettering.
White, red, and gold band with 'HVC 500th Anniversary' text. Features gold crown and pillars in center emblem.
Minimalist white and gold band with 'Epernay' in elegant script. Simple, clean design with understated branding.
White and black band with bold 'LUNATIC' text and ornate trim.
Deep blue band with silver border and Lunatic Nicaragua branding.
Purple and silver band with ornate patterns and bold Lunatic logo.
Deep blue and gold dual bands with Lunatic and Torch branding.

cigars.bandDescription: Silver and black band with 'Kristoff Veinte' and '20th Anniversary'. Decorative geometric patterns and bold, centered text.

La Aroma De Cuba Mi Amor
La Aroma De Cuba Mi Amor Reserva

cigars.bandDescription: White and gold band with 'La Aurora 120' in large text. Features lion emblem and 'Dominican Republic' on lower ribbon.
Cream and gold band with 'LFD' script and '25th Anniversary' text. Subtle pattern along bottom edge adds decorative detail.
Dark band with gold accents, red flower center, and LFD logo. Decorative laurel patterns surround bold visual elements.
Deep red and gold band featuring large 'LG' initials, elegant scrollwork, and the name 'Litto Gomez' prominently displayed.

Yellow band with gold borders featuring a circular illustration of a woman in red holding a cigar. The band displays 'LA GLORIA CUBANA' text arching over the image and 'CLASSIC' printed in black at the bottom of the band.
Dark red and gold band with 'La Palina' in bold text and '125 Años' in a red circle below.

Deep red geometric band with gold borders featuring a stylized 'M' design and white crown logo. The band displays 'BY MACANUDO' in white text against the burgundy bottom portion with a distinctive diamond-shaped pattern.

Black and white geometric band with a red border featuring a stylized 'M' design and crown logo. The band displays 'BY MACANUDO' in white text against the black bottom portion with distinctive diamond-shaped pattern elements.

Black and white geometric band with a tan border featuring a stylized 'M' design and crown logo. The band displays 'BY MACANUDO' in white text against the black bottom portion with distinctive diamond-shaped pattern elements.

White band with lime green borders featuring 'MACANUDO' curved along the top of a circular design. The center contains a coat of arms or shield emblem with 'HANDMADE' and 'GENUINE' text curved along the bottom of the circle.

Black band with silver borders featuring 'MACANUDO' in white lettering below a small crown logo. The band includes 'Inspirado' in white cursive script at the bottom and has decorative medallion-like patterns across the vibrant red background.

Green band with silver borders featuring 'MACANUDO' in white lettering below a small crown logo. The band includes 'Inspirado' in white cursive script at the bottom and has decorative medallion-like patterns across the vibrant red background.

White band with blue geometric pattern borders featuring 'MACANUDO' in navy lettering below a small crown logo. The band includes 'INSPIRADO' in blue cursive script at the bottom and has gold accents around the circular design.

Orange band with silver borders featuring 'MACANUDO' in black lettering below a small crown logo. The band includes 'Inspirado' in black cursive script at the bottom and has decorative medallion-like patterns across the vibrant orange background.

Red band with silver borders featuring 'MACANUDO' in white lettering below a small crown logo. The band includes 'Inspirado' in white cursive script at the bottom and has decorative medallion-like patterns across the vibrant red background.

White band with silver borders featuring 'MACANUDO' in black lettering below a small crown logo. The band includes 'Inspirado' in black cursive script at the bottom and has decorative medallion-like patterns across the vibrant white background.

Cream-colored band with gold borders at top and bottom featuring 'MACANUDO' in burgundy lettering with 'VINTAGE MADURO' beneath it. The elegant design combines the off-white background with metallic gold trim and rich burgundy text for a classic, premium appearance.

Deep Gray / Black band with gold borders at top and bottom featuring 'MACANUDO' in red lettering with 'VINTAGE' beneath it. The elegant, understated design has a charcoal gray background that provides strong contrast with the metallic gold trim and deep red text.

White band with ornate red decorative borders featuring a black circular emblem with 'MACANUDO' and '1968' text. Below the main band is a secondary red band with 'VINTAGE' printed in white, creating a classic, premium appearance with gold accents.

Gold circular band with 'MONTECRISTO' text around a fleur-de-lis symbol in the center. Below is a white shield-shaped band displaying a red 'M' with crown design, creating a distinctive dual-band presentation with classic Montecristo branding.
Brown and gold band with 'Montecristo 1935 Anniversary' and 'Edición Diamante' in white text, featuring a crown logo.
Gold and black band with 'Montecristo Nicaragua Series' and '1935 Anniversary.'

Black band featuring three circular emblems stacked vertically, each with copper/orange borders. The top circle displays 'MONTECRISTO' with a fleur-de-lis symbol, the middle shows 'GG' initials, and the bottom contains an eagle or bird design, all connected by decorative dotted lines.

Gold circular band with dark borders featuring 'MONTECRISTO' text around a fleur-de-lis symbol in the center. Below is a secondary black band displaying 'NEW YORK' in white letters with 'EDITION' underneath, creating a distinctive two-band design.

White circular band with red borders featuring 'MONTECRISTO' text around a fleur-de-lis symbol in the center. Below is a white secondary band displaying 'A. FERNANDEZ' in red lettering, creating a clean, classic two-band design with traditional Montecristo styling.

White circular band with red borders featuring 'MONTECRISTO' text around a fleur-de-lis symbol in the center. Below is a white secondary band displaying what appears to be a red barn or house illustration, creating a unique combination of classic Montecristo styling with rural imagery.

Blue oval band with gold borders featuring 'Don Pepin Garcia' in elegant gold script lettering. Below the main band is a secondary red band displaying 'ORIGINAL' in white block letters, creating a classic, premium cigar label design.

Multi-banded cigar with a cream-colored primary band featuring ornate 'DPG' monogram and decorative flourishes with 'Garcia & Garcia' text. Below are secondary bands including 'My Father' in elegant script and an orange band with 'CT' lettering, creating a layered, premium appearance.

Cream-colored band with red borders featuring 'EL CENTURION' text at the top and an ornate shield design with a large red 'C' in the center. The bottom portion displays decorative red flourishes and scrollwork against the light background.

Cream-colored band with ornate gold borders featuring 'DPG' monogram in elegant script lettering. The band includes 'Garcia & Garcia' text and decorative flourishes with red accent elements, creating a classic, premium cigar label design.

Rustic cream band with bold black text reading 'LEAF by Oscar 10th Anniversary Criollo'.
Large gradient '10' with tropical accents; 'Oscar Valladares' text below in turquoise with striped background.

Elegant cream and gold band with 'Padron' logo and cursive '50 Years' text, featuring a serial number at the bottom.
Gold and brown band featuring 'Padron' and 'Hand Crafted' text, with a serial number and '60th' written in cursive on the lower band.

Dark color cigar with Black and gold band with central sunburst seal, 'Tabacalera Perdomo' text, and bold red '20th Anniversary' label beneath.

Red and gold band with 'Perdomo Reserve' crest, green 'Sun Grown' text, and bold black '10th Anniversary' label at bottom.
Gold and red band, with a hint of black featuring sunburst logo, 'Treinta Años', and bold '30th Anniversary' in white text on red background.

Red band with gold ribbon-like design wrapped around it in an X or cross pattern. The elegant gold ribbon appears embossed or raised against the vibrant red background, creating a simple yet distinctive appearance without any text.

Black band with silver borders featuring 'Tatuaje' in elegant white cursive script. The simple, minimalist design uses a high-contrast color scheme with the stylized signature-like text as the sole decorative element.

Red band with thin white borders featuring 'Tatuaje' in elegant white cursive script. The vibrant red background creates a bold contrast with the refined, signature-like lettering for a simple yet distinctive appearance.

Double-banded cigar with a red primary band featuring 'Tatuaje' in white cursive script. Below is a secondary red band with 'Verocu' in white lettering, both bands featuring silver/white borders for a classic, refined appearance.
